channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Gritting bin empty, 20th January
item.description:
Ice continually builds up as vehicles go through the ford in School Road adjacent to No. 45. The grit bin has been empty for weeks now and the shovel is missing

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 47 School Road, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous junction, 20th January
item.description:
Vehicles often fail to give way at this junction for road users on Pittville Crescent Lane. Visibility needs to be improved at this junction especially when coming from Albert Road. It would also help if vehicles stopped parking on the corner, forcing vehicles on the wrong side of the road before pulling out. Not a great place for vulnerable road users.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Pittville Crescent Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Better safer accessibility, 20th January
item.description:
Can we have a safer crossing please for people who do not use the tunnel? Cycles are not permitted but the road is very busy, some priority crossing would help.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 108 Evesham Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken glass on path, 20th January
item.description:
As per the title!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 219 Prestbury Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cycle lane frequently blocked by illegal parking, 20th January
item.description:
Cars/Vans blocking access from deep street into bouncers lane. Cycle path entry is narrow and when someone blocks this, there is no access.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Bouncer's Lane, Prestbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Inconsiderate and dangerous parking, 20th January
item.description:
Mentioned several times to parents of school children attending St Mary's COE by the local headmaster. He needs more support from councillors and the local Police. As pedestrians we have had numerous near misses with drivers not looking when alighting. The pavement and green areas are damaged badly and looks ugly, all because some don't want to walk a few meters down the road! Laziness has become the new norm. Most drivers who do this just sit in their cars with engines idling and on their phones, something we were told was illegal also!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 30 Bouncer's Lane, Prestbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More flytipping, 20th January
item.description:
Happens every other week/month. Why is no solution being implemented for the residents? It looks appalling and brings the area down.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Cotswold Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins constantly blocking cycle path, 20th January
item.description:
Bins have been left by residents for weeks on this cycle path making the pathway dangerous. Sometimes contents have been seen on the road, including glass. Some enforcement would be nice.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 18 Sotherby Walk, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More beer cans, usual places, 20th January
item.description:
Yet again more beer cans ditched outside the school on the green. Usual suspects drinking and drug taking before heading back to "sober" accommodation at the end of the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 39 Cornwall Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Silver Ford focus, 20th January
item.description:
Car left randomly abbandoned. Broken windscreen been left for 3 weeks .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Birdwood Crescent, Brockworth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot hole down to sub stone below, 20th January
item.description:
Look like an old repair has come apart and the stone underneath is exposed
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 40 Oakland Avenue, Cheltenham

item.title: Sunken ultility cover, 20th January
item.description:
The utility cover in the road has sunk leading to a large depression in the road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 The Clarence Clarence Parade, Cheltenham

item.title: Blocked drain, 20th January
item.description:
Huge puddle forms here each time it rains due to blocked drain (and obviously there's no puddle at the moment, so don't go out and report no issue (as has happened on previous reports)... apply some common sense)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 24 Albert Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pot holes all along here, 20th January
item.description:
This road is disgraceful. Bodged repairs and loads of other pot holes.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 88 Prestbury Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Deep pot hole on lane going in Prestbury direction, 20th January
item.description:
Prestbury Rd is bloody awful but there's a deep hole here
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 44 Prestbury Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Several potholes in the run up to the roundabout, 19th January
item.description:
Multiple Potholes have developed since the snow in December. They are in the road between145 Caernarvon Road and the roundabout at the bottom of Warden Hill Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 147 Caernarvon Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Issue with roundabout, 19th January
item.description:
Kerb which defines roundabout has collapsed and sticking out of road by approx 3 inches.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 20 Court Road, Brockworth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement 100% obstructed, 19th January
item.description:
ROAD CLOSED sign blocks pavement outside 6 Deep Street. No provision for footway closure or redirection. Does not comply with DoT guidance which requires at least 1m of pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Deep Street, Prestbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fix, 19th January
item.description:
Whole road is a Danger and disgrace from Crickley hill park to salterley grange. You have to swerve to avoid various holes. One which is bad is marked. Please resurface this road. Itâ€™s too fast, narrow and dangerous. The temporary fixes are too temporary!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Salterley Grange Salterley Grange, Ullenwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter strewn down both sides of B4070, 19th January
item.description:
There is a build up of unsightly litter down both sides of the B4070 as it approaches Birdlip from the A417. This has been exacerbated by recent mowing of the verges and drivers using this road as a short cut throwing litter from cars.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): B4070, Birdlip
Report on FixMyStreet
